name: CLOWN GUTZ DEMO
description:
Based off the weird, obscure and wonderful "clown husbandry" tumblr community

Clowns have been living in peace... until some dick head scientists thought "ayo what if we made em' fight!?" and started to kidnap and mutate clowns into big brawlin' beasts. Our badass protagonist, JB (short for Jaw Breaker) catches wind of this horrible news and decides to fly on over there with some wacky looking flying carnival ride she stole. It is now your job to get to them scientists and show them your business whilst trying to turn the infected clowns into normal functioning people again.
